personal.name: Mesut Kiraz
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.tagline: Creative Developer Building Immersive Gaming Experiences
personal.bio: Experienced Full Stack Developer with expertise in creating multiplayer browser-based games. Skilled in technologies like Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Unity. Holds an Associate Degree in Computer Programming from Çanakkale Onsekiz Mart University.

experience.description: Developed clones of popular games and published them on GitHub. Contributed to open-source projects and showcased advanced programming skills.
Developed multiplayer browser-based games using technologies like Babylon.js and PostgreSQL. Managed backend infrastructure for real-time communication.

projects.name: The Untouchables
projects.description: Competitive multiplayer game where players push each other off a platform.

education.degree: UNITY ILE 3D OYUN GELIŞTIRME BTK Akademi
